import './skills.css'; import React from 'react' export default function Skills() { /*==================== ACCORDION SKILLS ====================*/ const skillsContent = document.getElementsByClassName('skills_content'); const skillsHeader = document.querySelectorAll('.skills_header'); function toggleSkills() { let itemClass = this.parentNode.className for (i = 0; i < skillsContent.length; i++) { skillsContent[i].className = 'skills_content skills_close' } if (itemClass === 'skills_content skills_close') { this.parentNode.className = 'skills_content skills_open' } } skillsHeader.forEach((el) => { el.addEventListener('click', toggleSkills) }) return (
